suite.name: Teste Admin Crud

kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Creates a database connection using the DB API 2.0 ``db_module`` and the parameters provided. Along with listed commonly used arguments (`db_name`, `db_host` etc.) you can set any other DB module specific parameters as key/value pairs.

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
INSERT INTO genero (nome) VALUES ('Robot Rock');
kw.doc: Executes the ``sql_string`` as a single SQL command.

kw.name: Query
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
SELECT id FROM genero WHERE nome = 'Robot Rock';

Query returned 1 rows
Rowid
016
kw.arg: SELECT id FROM genero WHERE nome = 'Robot Rock';
kw.doc: Runs a query with the ``select_statement`` and returns the result as list of rows. The type of row values depends on the database module - usually they are tuples or tuple-like objects.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
INSERT INTO artista (nome) VALUES ('Daft Punk Robot');
kw.arg: INSERT INTO artista (nome) VALUES ('Daft Punk Robot');
kw.doc: Executes the ``sql_string`` as a single SQL command.

kw.name: Query
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
SELECT id FROM artista WHERE nome = 'Daft Punk Robot';

Query returned 1 rows
Rowid
015
kw.arg: SELECT id FROM artista WHERE nome = 'Daft Punk Robot';
kw.doc: Runs a query with the ``select_statement`` and returns the result as list of rows. The type of row values depends on the database module - usually they are tuples or tuple-like objects.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=flask_app, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

suite.doc: Teste CRUD Admin com Bypass de CSRF.

suite.name: Teste Login

test.name: Cenario 1: Login Com Sucesso

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.msg: Text 'Sair' did not appear in 2 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
kw.status: Text 'Sair' did not appear in 2 seconds.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: error=O campo de email não apareceu.
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Garante que estamos deslogados, loga e valida o acesso.
